Package com.notkamui.javaisyou.engine.boardelement

Class BoardElement

java.lang.Object
com.notkamui.javaisyou.engine.boardelement.BoardElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Displayable, HasImage, LocatedObject, java.lang.Cloneable
public final class BoardElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocatedObject, Displayable, java.lang.Cloneable
The representation of an element on the board. A BoardElement knows its coordinates, state, type, and which rule part type it is.
